article: While most high school students spend most of their time worrying about who likes who , and different relationships between their classmates , I choose to focus on my school lessons and sports . When I was young , my mother encouraged me to develop and keep friendship with boys in order to build strong relationships . But she told me not to risk a good friendship with a boy with the title of boyfriend . It ' s indeed a wise choice to stay friends with those of the opposite sex . In my opinion , even though some high school relationship might continue after graduation , the probability of them lasting much longer is so slim that there really is not a point to it . Firstly you have to think about such a question - - whether it is possible to hurt both of you , or even hurt both of your future husbands or wives . My second point is that you still can date if you hope marriage could possibly follow . Except this , there really is not any other reason for dating . Some students desire relationships for a chance to be romantic . While these are nice to have , there are many more important things at this point in our lives . The titles of boyfriend and girlfriend put too much stress on a relationship between high school students . Just staying as common friends may be the best choice for us . I strongly recommend we should deal with it in an appropriate way and follow our teachers ' advice if necessary .
